scripts.compile-abi: solcjs --abi --include-path node_modules/ --base-path . -o compiler-output/abis voteContract/* integration/* registry/*
scripts.compile-bin: solcjs --bin --include-path node_modules/ --base-path . -o compiler-output/bins voteContract/* integration/* registry/*
scripts.compile: npm run compile-abi && npm run compile-bin
